landing.title: BlueScript
landing.description: BlueScript is a non-profit organization that develops free and open-source tools to help dyslexic individuals.

features.title: Why Choose BlueScript?
features.description: BlueScript is a non-profit organization dedicated to developing free and open-source tools that support individuals with dyslexia.
features.headline: Key Features

card1.title: User-Friendly
card1.description: BlueScript is intuitively designed for individual use, enabling individuals with dyslexia to benefit with minimal professional assistance.

card2.title: Always Free
card2.description: Committed to accessibility, BlueScript ensures that everyone has free access to essential dyslexia support tools.

card3.title: Open Source
card3.description: BlueScript welcomes contributions from everyone. Access our source code to modify, enhance, and innovate freely.

card4.title: Privacy First
card4.description: BlueScript prioritizes your privacy by not collecting any personal information, upholding your fundamental right to privacy.

card5.title: Fully Accessible
card5.description: Utilizing the latest web technologies, BlueScript is designed to be accessible on all devices, ensuring inclusivity for all users.

card6.title: Scientifically Backed
card6.description: BlueScript's training methods are developed and validated by experts with over two decades of dyslexia research experience.

footer.license: This project is available under the GNU GPL v3.0 license.

training.typeAnswer:
Please type the characters you saw
(Press Enter or space to submit)
training.correct:
Correct!
(Press Enter or space to continue)
training.incorrect:
Incorrect!
(Press Enter or space to continue)
training.sequencingInstruction:
Press the right arrow to move the cursor
(press Enter or spacebar to select)
training.continue: Press spacebar or enter to continue
training.guess: Press the key that matches the character getting revealed

Rapid Visual Perception.description: 250ms 이하의 시간 안에 화면에 나타나는 문자를 식별하고 입력하는 훈련.

Sequential Visual Memory.description: 일련의 문자를 순차적으로 식별하고 기억한 후, 일정 시간이 지난 후에 다시 입력하는 훈련.

Character Sequencing.description: 프롬프트를 순서대로 찾고, 오른쪽 화살표 키와 스페이스바를 사용하여 문자를 입력하는 훈련.

Character Matching.description: 프롬프트와 시각적으로 비슷한 문자열들 중에서 일치하는 문자열을 클릭하는 훈련.

Character Guesstimate.description: 서서히 나타나는 문자를 가능한 한 빨리 식별하는 훈련.

result.title: Training Result
result.noDataDesc: Please load a training result or start a new training.
result.averageRevealedDesc: Average percentage of revealed chunks of a character
result.averageTrialTimeDesc: Average time spent on each trial (in seconds)
